extensionDescription.message: Bookmark tab groups, supports custom names, save locations, and right-click operations

quick_add_desc.message: Add current tab group to bookmarks

duplicate_group.message: This group has already been saved!

feature_content_matching.message: Added content-based matching for duplicate detection

feature_quick_add.message: Implemented quick add with async duplicate check

feature_ui_optimization.message: Optimized UI with clearer labels and component-inline alerts

feature_ui_fixes.message: Fixed bookmarkFolder height and help button issues

save_success.message: Successfully saved $1 tab groups to bookmarks!

help_feature_1.message: 1. Quickly save current tab groups to bookmarks

help_feature_2.message: 2. Support batch saving multiple tab groups

help_feature_3.message: 3. Smart duplicate content detection to avoid duplicates

help_feature_4.message: 4. Support custom save locations and default folders

warning_no_groups.message: Please select tab groups to save first

warning_no_folder.message: Please select a bookmark location first

duplicate_warning.message: Tab group "$1" may already exist with duplicate content ("$2"), please check.

duplicate_confirm.message: The content of tab group "$1" already exists in bookmarks ("$2"), do you still want to save it?
